page.title: 12Entertainment
page.content: { {Family Barbecue} Barbecues are held every year in someone's garden. This year it was held on 11th July and 120 people came and they raised Â£150 for St.Margaret's Hospice. {Coffee Mornings} About every 3 months there is a coffee morning in the Parish Room. It has been going on for 6 or 7 years. They raise about Â£20 to Â£30. {The Disco} The Disco has been going for 2 years. It takes place in the Parish Room. It is on about once every month. They only allow children between 5 and 16 to come. They charge 50p for one person.
